activities:
We provide our customers with online advertising technology that tracks end-user impression, click, and conversion data and helps customers evaluate the effectiveness of their ad campaigns. 

Based on instruction from our customers located in EU/EEA and/or Switzerland we process and manage account data, including customer and employee names, information about advertising campaigns,  IP address and advertising identifiers from end user devices, publisher names, and advertiser records.

We also collect and process organizational HR data for less than 10 employees located in the EU.

All customer and end-user data is distributed and stored in  Amazon Web Services locations in the United States and Ireland.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: 1) Organizational HR data and, 2) Customer account data, end-user data, including advertising identifiers and IP Addresses, and on-line customer transaction data.
privacyprograms:
TRUSTe has assessed 3 TUNE privacy policies under the Safe Harbor Principles:
http://www.tune.com/privacy-policy/
http://www.hasoffers.com/privacy-policy/
http://www.mobileapptracking.com/privacy-policy/
recoursemech:
For both commercial data and HR data, we implement internal recourse mechanisms.  

For commercial data, if internal mechanisms do not resolve a dispute then we work with TRUSTe.  

For HR data, we would refer the employee to their relevant EU DPA or the Swiss FDPIC to investigate all unresolved complaints.
